message: Watch when you switch your cards, some of them will lower the score.
Don't mix the two items together.  Pick one of them and try using the tools multiple times.  Try using the number increaser over and over again.  I got up to at least 20 with it.
Separate all of the animals and mutate them before you add them altogether.
Don't mix more than 2 animals together, but choose 2.  Don't be afraid to play around with any of the tools.  Keep adding as they shouldn't go negative.
Increasing the number is more powerful and effective than the suit swapper.
Cautious and don't have to use them all.

Combine at least 2 items.  However, don't use all 4 tools at once.  Use a maximum of 3, else you'll lose points for making it too messy.  The frame seems to be a good add-on that will give you 20 points.

Stick to 2 animals.  If they are noted to have breathing problems, use the lung tool.  Then play around and feel free to add the other tools.  Note that you can use them multiples and make the combined animal gigantic.
Watch out how much you add. too many things will make the creation worthless. Try to pick things that make sense.
Mix them before adding them together.
Only pick 2 craft items.  Then use your tools very sparingly to avoid making them "messy."  Use paint only once.  You can add a frame for a nice decorative touch to add points.
Just mix the potions
Adding too many extras often makes the creature less powerful.
Adding all three materials at one time often leads to worse outcomes.
Jack of Hearts will win the game.
Watch how much you increase the creature, it often leads to bad results.
Think about the ingredients as if you were to combine them in your own kitchen. Items that you feel should work probably will. Don't be afraid to experiment!
The number increaser can only increase your score up to 20, after that it will reduce your score
Make sure to fix the breathing problems of your animals and think about which animals might go well together.
Think about the ingredients as if you were going to combine them in real life.
Combine animals with the other animal to get more scores
Don't be afraid to try different combinatiosn and make sure to rectify the breathing problems as they arise.
Follow recipe procedure when cooking
Ensure the animal matches
Follow the recipe procedure to earn more scores
